Package arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Hamiltonian
    A Hamiltonian object represents a term in a CPM Hamiltonian equation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdhesionHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for adhesion energy.
    AdhesionHamiltonian2D
    Extension of AdhesionHamiltonian for 2D.
    AdhesionHamiltonian3D
    Extension of AdhesionHamiltonian for 3D.
    AdhesionHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for AdhesionHamiltonian parameters.
    HeightHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for height energy.
    HeightHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for HeightHamiltonian parameters.
    JunctionHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for tight junction energy.
    JunctionHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for JunctionHamiltonian parameters.
    PersistenceHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for persistence energy.
    PersistenceHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for PersistenceHamiltonian parameters.
    SubstrateHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for substrate energy.
    SubstrateHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for SubstrateHamiltonian parameters.
    SurfaceHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for surface energy.
    SurfaceHamiltonian2D
    Extension of SurfaceHamiltonian for 2D.
    SurfaceHamiltonian3D
    Extension of SurfaceHamiltonian for 3D.
    SurfaceHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for SurfaceHamiltonian parameters.
    VolumeHamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for volume energy.
    VolumeHamiltonianConfig
    Configuration for VolumeHamiltonian parameters.
